# showWhileTracking

**Type Property**

Specifies whether the insertion indicator shows during a tracking loop.

## Declaration

```swift
static var showWhileTracking: NSTextInsertionIndicator.AutomaticModeOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

When set, the insertion indicator hides during an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSEventTrackingRunLoopMode] such as while actively scrolling a view.

## Configuring automatic mode options

- **showEffectsView**: Specifies whether a trailing glow displays during dictation.
